description:
Second Lieutenant Heymans Breda is one of http://anidb.net/ch6586 [Roy Mustang]`s most trusted subordinates. He was recruited by Mustang for his high level of intelligence, indicated by his talent with chess and other strategy games. Despite his intelligence, he still has an irrational fear of dogs. Breda is usually tasked by Mustang with jobs that require he travel abroad. He is transferred to Western Headquarters when Mustang`s group is broken up by the homunculi.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Heymans Breda
